data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Davy-Bowker, John, Hammett, Michael J., Mauvisseau, Quentin, Sweet, Michael J. (2018): Rediscovery of the critically endangered ‘ scarce yellow sally stonefly’ Isogenus nubecula in United Kingdom after a 22 year period of absence. Zootaxa 4394 (2): 295-300, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4394.2.12
